title: Between the Scenes - The Mueller Report & Lessons in Criminal Justice for Powerful White People
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - The Mueller Report & Lessons in Criminal Justice for Powerful White People
description:
Trevor discusses the Mueller report and uses a metaphor involving cookie theft to illustrate his confusion about America's obstruction of justice laws.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
